description:
GRANBELM is finally down to two participants. Their mechs surpass their own limits, but eventually they can no longer withstand the impact sustained during the battle, and their functions begin to fail. When Shingetsu`s situation grows dire, she`s surprised by the appearance of Mangetsu, who was supposed to have disappeared...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Only Two of Their Kind in the World
Pour ces deux filles uniques au monde
Sekai de Yuiitsu no Futari no Tame ni
世界で唯一のふたりのために
